snippet.title: Championship Motocross featuring Ricky Carmichael open class Championship - 7 Jackson Mississippi
snippet.description:
Championship Motocross featuring Ricky Carmichael open class Championship - 7 Jackson Mississippi

CHAMPIONSHIP MOTOCROSS FEATURING RICKY CARMICHAEL brings the jumps and stunts of motocross racing to the PlayStation. Pick a bike from three categories 125cc, 250cc, and open classcc and customize it. Then use the Practice mode to learn how to get the most out of your vehicle. When you feel comfortable turning and burning, challenge all comers to a single race on one of 12 tracks, or endure the ups and downs of a season. With the championship in hand, challenge your friends to some head-to-head action. No matter what mode you play, the thumping tunes of Vanilla Ice, Godsmack, and others will draw you into the action. CHAMPIONSHIP MOTOCROSS will challenge all of your driving skills.

Release Date: August 15, 1999
MSRP: 28.99 USD
E for Everyone:
Genre: Racing
Publisher: THQ
Developer: Funcom
